obgyn_access_scores:obgyns_e2sfca.long_name: OBGYN care access score (2 step-enhanced floating catchment areas)
obgyn_access_scores:obgyns_e2sfca.short_description: Index of OBGYN care accessibility based on supply and demand of providers
obgyn_access_scores:obgyns_e2sfca.long_description: OBGYN care access score based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of OBGYNs per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for OBGYNs (population served by OBGYNs). Provider address data was collected from WebMD's online physician directory.
obgyn_access_scores:obgyns_e2sfca.statement: The OBGYN access score for {features.name} is {value}
